commits.content:
[config]
skip_core_tasks = false
on_error_task = "notification"

[tasks.default]
dependencies = ["format-check", "clippy", "test"]
description = "Default task: format check, clippy, and tests"

[tasks.rust-fmt]
command = "cargo"
args = ["fmt"]
description = "Format code with rustfmt"

[tasks.format]
command = "cargo"
args = ["fmt"]
description = "Format code with rustfmt"

[tasks.format-check]
command = "cargo"
args = ["fmt", "--", "--check"]

[tasks.clippy]
command = "cargo"
args = ["clippy", "--", "-D", "warnings"]

[tasks.clippy-pedantic]
command = "cargo"
args = ["clippy", "--", "-D", "warnings", "-W", "clippy::pedantic"]

[tasks.rust-test]
command = "cargo"
args = ["test", "--quiet"]
description = "Run tests (quiet mode)"

[tasks.test]
command = "cargo"
args = ["test", "--quiet"]
description = "Run tests (quiet mode)"

[tasks.test-timeout]
command = "timeout"
args = ["1s", "cargo", "test", "--quiet"]
description = "Run tests with 1s timeout to prevent freezing"

[tasks.test-all]
command = "cargo"
args = ["test", "--all-features"]

[tasks.test-integration]
command = "cargo"
args = ["test", "--test", "integration_examples", "--", "--ignored"]
description = "Run integration tests for examples"

[tasks.build]
command = "cargo"
args = ["build"]

[tasks.build-release]
command = "cargo"
args = ["build", "--release"]

[tasks.check]
command = "cargo"
args = ["check"]

[tasks.check-all]
command = "cargo"
args = ["check", "--all-features"]

[tasks.doc]
command = "cargo"
args = ["doc", "--no-deps"]

[tasks.doc-open]
command = "cargo"
args = ["doc", "--open", "--no-deps"]

[tasks.build-examples]
command = "cargo"
args = ["build", "--examples"]

[tasks.run-example-basic]
command = "cargo"
args = ["run", "--example", "basic", "--", "--help"]

[tasks.run-example-services]
command = "cargo"
args = ["run", "--example", "services", "--", "services", "status"]

[tasks.ci]
dependencies = [
    "format-check",
    "clippy",
    "test-timeout",
    "build-examples",
    "check-all",
]

[tasks.pre-release]
dependencies = [
    "format-check",
    "clippy",
    "test-all",
    "build-release",
    "build-examples",
    "doc",
]

[tasks.release-check]
description = "Run all checks before release"
dependencies = [
    "format-check",
    "clippy-pedantic",
    "test-all",
    "build-release",
    "build-examples",
    "check-all",
]

[tasks.clean]
command = "cargo"
args = ["clean"]

[tasks.clean-all]
command = "cargo"
args = ["clean"]
description = "Clean all build artifacts"

[tasks.audit]
command = "cargo"
args = ["audit"]

[tasks.expand]
description = "Expand macros for debugging"
command = "cargo"
args = ["expand", "--test", "attribute_macro_acceptance"]

[tasks.watch]
command = "cargo"
args = ["watch", "-x", "test"]

[tasks.lint]
dependencies = ["format-check", "clippy"]

[tasks.verify]
description = "Verify code quality: format, clippy, and tests"
dependencies = ["format-check", "clippy", "test-timeout"]

[tasks.notification]
script = '''
echo "Task failed - check output above"
'''
description = "Error notification task"

[tasks.watch-test]
description = "Watch for changes and run tests"
command = "cargo"
args = ["watch", "-x", "test"]

[tasks.watch-build]
description = "Watch for changes and build"
command = "cargo"
args = ["watch", "-x", "build"]
